column5: They were talking about this on the the Fan 590 this afternoon. I had to look it up on youtube. Apparently this guy has invented a better jock. If the link doesn't work just goggle nutty Buddy. He does stand behind his product, lol. Not sure if it would stand up to a Hull one timer though. And now let the punchlines begin.
LOL...that little demo took a lot of balls.
HAHA it would be so muhc funnier if something went wrong
He certainly had some balls to pull that one off. Base balls i mean... honestly really...  G
